RasterGetter

class src.lidarToGeo.get_data.RasterGetter(bounds: str, crs: int)[source]

fetches the point cloud data from the usgs-lidar-public bucket and converts it to a geopandas dataframe

dataset: https://registry.opendata.aws/usgs-lidar/

Methods

RasterGetter.__init__(bounds, crs)

RasterGetter.construct_pipeline()

creates a list containing a json of the pipeline to pass into the PDAL library

RasterGetter.get_geodataframe(region, ...)

Converts the pdal generated tif file into a shp file and creates a geodataframe from the shp file and calculates it topographic wetness index

RasterGetter.get_raster_terrain(region)

Generates the region's las and tif files using the pdal library

RasterGetter.get_region(bounds)

Gets all the regions the given boundaries lie in

RasterGetter.region_gdf_dict(saved_png[, ...])

creates a dictionary where the keys are the regions or the years where the entered boundaries fall in

RasterGetter.save_as_geojson(filename)

saves the geopandas datafrme in the geojson format

RasterGetter.tif_to_shp(tif_filename, ...)

Converts the pdal generated tif file into a shp file
